title: note.template Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

bytes.description: The number of bytes that will be transmitted to Notehub, per Note, before compression.

template.description: `true` if an active template exists on the Notefile.

body.description: If the `verify` argument is provided and the Notefile has an active template, the template `body`.

length.description: If the `verify` argument is provided and the Notefile has an active template with a payload, the payload length.

format.description: If the `format` argument is provided, this represents the format applied to the template.
